# categoryType

**Instance Property**

The category to which this accessory belongs.

## Declaration

```swift
var categoryType: String { get }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/accessory-category-types] for possible values.

## Reading the category type

- **Accessory Category Types**: The accessory category types supported by HomeKit.
